articles.title: How DeepSeek and Open-Source Models Are Shaking Up AI
articles.summary: Tech companies and academics have long wrestled with the risks and rewards of building open-source software. But the frenzy around generative artificial intelligence has lent new significance to the debate.

articles.title: AI Investments Key for SoftBank Shares After $65 Billion Rally
articles.summary: After adding $65 billion in market value over the past four months, the fate of SoftBank Group Corp. shares is more firmly attached to the global artificial intelligence boom than ever before.
articles.translated_title: AI Investments Key for SoftBank Shares After $65 Billion Rally
articles.translated_summary: After adding $65 billion in market value over the past four months, the fate of SoftBank Group Corp. shares is more firmly attached to the global artificial intelligence boom than ever before.

articles.title: Arista’s Stock Jump Pushes CEO Ullal’s Wealth to $6.4 Billion
articles.summary: In the artificial intelligence gold rush, even pick-and-shovel companies like Arista Networks Inc. are seeing their fortunes swell. The hardware provider’s shares have more than doubled since April, reaching an all-time high on Wednesday.
articles.translated_title: Arista’s Stock Jump Pushes CEO Ullal’s Wealth to $6.4 Billion
articles.translated_summary: In the artificial intelligence gold rush, even pick-and-shovel companies like Arista Networks Inc. are seeing their fortunes swell. The hardware provider’s shares have more than doubled since April, reaching an all-time high on Wednesday.

articles.title: Court strikes down California law on election-related AI deepfakes
articles.summary: The law came amid increased concerns about the quick advancement of artificial intelligence and its effects on political candidates.

articles.title: OpenAI Eyes $500 Billion Valuation in Share Sale Talks | The Pulse 8/06/2025
articles.summary:
OpenAI is in early talks about a potential sale of stock for current and former employees at a valuation of about $500 billion, people briefed on the investment discussions said, marking an enormous gain in value for the artificial intelligence leader. The company is targeting a secondary stock sale in the billions of dollars, the people said, asking to remain anonymous because they weren’t authorized to discuss the matter publicly. If the deal goes ahead, it would elevate OpenAI’s on-paper price tag by roughly two-thirds. In trade news, President Donald Trump said he’d impose increased tariffs on countries buying energy from Russia while clarifying that levies on semiconductor and pharmaceutical imports would be announced “within the next week or so.” 
Today's guests: Kim Crawford, JPMorgan Asset Management Global Rates Portfolio Manager, Karsten Munk Knudsen, Novo Nordisk CFO (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: 'Skeevy' Epstein gave us the creeps: AI experts recall bizarre island visit

articles.title: A politician made an AI clone of himself. The outrage was real.
articles.summary: British lawmaker Mark Sewards released an artificial intelligence prototype of himself to help deal with a backlog of queries from constituents. Some weren’t impressed.

articles.title: U.S. charges Chinese nationals with illegally exporting chips to China
articles.summary: Two Chinese nationals residing in California have been arrested and charged with violating export control laws by allegedly shipping advanced microchips used in artificial intelligence to China.
